biography_text: JOYCE, David, a Representative from Ohio; born in Cleveland, Cuyahoga County, Ohio, March 17, 1957; graduated from West Geauga High School, Chesterland, Ohio, 1975; B.S., University of Dayton, Dayton, Ohio, 1979; J.D., University of Dayton, Dayton, Ohio, 1982; Cuyahoga County, Ohio, public defender, 1983-1984; Geauga County, Ohio, public defender, 1985-1988; Geauga County, Ohio, prosecutor, 1988-2012; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Thirteenth and to the two succeeding Congresses (January 3, 2013-present).
